_sText: Dodgeball...But whats this? Surf? --------------------------------------------------- db_surf is not an ordinary dodgeball map. There is a twist to it. There is actually a surf ramp that requires you to go down to lead to the dodgeball arena. This map was created by me, ReV0L33t (or ReVolution on CSS). --------------------------------------------------- Requirements for this map to be enjoyable: • A working DB mod that gives you flashbangs only and one health • Edit your server.cfg and add the following command: sv_airaccelerate 100 --------------------------------------------------- Please enjoy this map. I have created it personally for your fun and to see other dodgeball servers have it in the map rotation. Please credit me if you remake this map in any way, shape, or form. --------------------------------------------------- Updates: 6/9/08 • Fixed lighting (made it brighter) • Now includes db_surf_lite in the .rar (lite version is brighter) ---------------------------------------------------
